homePage.title: Anyska's beauty diary
homePage.subtitle: Grab a cup of tea and let's chat beauty, shall we?

articles.title: 20 in 2020 rolling project pan (#teamprojectpan2020) May Update
articles.description: I’m back with another update on my project pan. This month has been a pretty good month when it comes to empties. I’ve used up 6 products and got really good progress on another handful. I will admit, I do not really care to put makeup on while I am at home, so I haven’t…

articles.title: 20 in 2020 rolling project pan (#teamprojectpan2020) April Update
articles.description: I’m back with another update on my project pan. March has been a crazy month, I think to that we can all agree, so I have not made much progress as I have not worn makeup more than a handful of times. I only have 3 empties, but I have a pretty good strategy set…

articles.title: 20 in 2020 rolling project pan (#teamprojectpan2020) March Update
articles.description: It’s time for the first update on this project. I’ll dare to say that February has been a very productive month as I have used up 7 items as pictured below. The 7 items I’ve used up were: Pixi eyeliner in Cobalt Blue; Makeup Revolution lip liner in Reign; Wet’n’Wild PhotoFocus foundation; Himalaya body moisturizer;…

articles.title: 20 in 2020 rolling project pan (#teamprojectpan2020)
articles.description: As I have said in my previous post, I intend on starting a new project pan this year, only one, which will be a rolling project and will contain 20 items to be worked on at all times. Does this mean I’ll be working on all of them every day? That’s impossible, but I’ll be…

articles.title: New year, new blog?
articles.description: It’s been 7 months since I last published a post on this blog and I feel like there is a dire need for a change in what regards the content that I usually posted on this blog. It is clear to me that it no longer sparks joy to me or maybe that it never…
